survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Mobile Banking App Features Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users regarding their satisfaction with various features of mobile banking apps to help improve user experience and functionality.

questions.question_text: How often do you use your mobile banking app?
questions.client_notes: This question helps gauge frequency of use, which can correlate with satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How often do you use your mobile banking app?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you use most frequently in your mobile banking app? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Understanding feature usage can help prioritize improvements.

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you use most frequently in your mobile banking app? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the overall user interface of your mobile banking app? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: A Likert scale helps measure satisfaction levels quantitatively.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the overall user interface of your mobile banking app? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your mobile banking app?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Open-ended questions can provide qualitative insights for app enhancements.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text box for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your mobile banking app?
script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues with your mobile banking app in the past 6 months?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Identifying technical issues can help prioritize bug fixes and updates.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues with your mobile banking app in the past 6 months?
script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please describe the technical issues you encountered.
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if 'Yes' is selected in Q5
questions.client_notes: Detailed descriptions of issues can aid in troubleshooting and improving app stability.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text box for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please describe the technical issues you encountered.
script.routing_logic: Appears only if 'Yes' is selected in Q5
